intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Kris, just ahead is the Dark Pontifex, Gharnef--possibly the strongest sorcerer alive... or dead. Kris...

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Your resistance to magic is impeccable. You might just be our strongest hope of defeating Gharnef. Yes. If you are there, then... we stand to win.

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: Sire... I'm honored. I'll give it my all!

battle.speaker: Gharnef
battle.line: So you've come, boy. How many times must you get in my way? Enough! I tire of our games!!

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: Gharnef, what have you done with my sister and the others?! Release them at once!

battle.speaker: Gharnef
battle.line: Heh heh heh... I've allowed them the honor of being sacrifices for the Shadow Dragon's resurrection. You will never see them again. Emperor Medeus will soon be reborn in his true and darkest form. And they will usher in a new era. 'Tis a pity. Their souls couldn't bear the suffering and shattered into pieces... Even I am powerless to help them. Shame, really. I have them to thank for the Shadow Dragon's awakening. Not even the Binding Shield can stop him now. I applaud you for coming this far. But... little prince... you will go no further. I will kill you here, and you will die knowing that you are nothing!!

boss.speaker: Gharnef
boss.line: Heh heh heh... Perhaps... a taste of Imhullu's might is necessary.

boss.speaker: Gharnef
boss.line: Heh heh... You're too late... The end is nigh...

boss.speaker: Gharnef
boss.line: Your blade is blunt before me, Marth... I'll smash you and the Binding Shield into pieces!!

boss.speaker: Marth
boss.line: I do not intend to fall here. Out of my way, Gharnef!

boss.speaker: Gharnef
boss.line: Heh heh heh... Allow me demonstrate Imhullu's might...

boss.speaker: Kris
boss.line: I will not let Prince Marth die. I won't...!

boss.speaker: Gharnef
boss.line: Heh heh heh... Allow me demonstrate Imhullu's might...

boss.speaker: Kris
boss.line: I will not let Prince Marth die. I won't let the likes of you lay even a finger on him...!
